title: Meaning Crisis Discord Channel Paul Vanderklay Q&A May 26, 2020
description:
A new Discord channel is operating to study the work of John Vervaeke. You can join it at this link.  https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv

Their Youtube channel is here. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqMjfLBUjqy9EJUaLyOeMiA

They invited me to do a Question and Answer and this is the recording. 

Questions and notes
1. PVK personal introduction into conversation

2. My pluralism comment with my last conversation with John

3. spirituality
Father was LDS and said must have these things. 
community
ritual
authority
worldview
spirituality: what makes things move

4. how to reenter christianity

5. Mark LeFevere two worlds mythology

6. The goracle: Glory, grace and the Holy Spirit

7. Jacob: religion that's not a religion The God idea

8. Sin as feature vs. bug. Religion without religion. human iniquity and dissonance 

9. Golden tipped Pen: God #1 and God #2 
Hi Paul, I recently just watched a podcast in where you mentioned your concepts of God 1 and God 2. A question that I have is how do you characterize and differentiate particular intelligent design (such as natural selection and central pattern generators) versus more wholistic, phenomenological, gestalt-esque components of God (such as the salience landscape and relevance realization)? Does the difference lie in a matter of scale

10. Nick B. Handling disagreement and focus. Why has Bridges of Meaning been able to hold this tension so well so far? 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A
